phrases: The Academy of Shinigami Weapons Wielders.
To prevent the rebirth of the Kishin,
the beings that nearly destroyed everything,
plunging the world into the depths of fear and
engulfing people into a swirl of madness,
this training facility for weapons created by Shinigami...
I wonder why it is an Academy.
So, if you think you are prepared, let us have a go at it!
So, if you think you are prepared, let us have a go at it!
Commemorative production for 10 whole years of Bones!!
Bones will also broadcast many other productions, but...
And so, to celebrate, we present Episode 2.
Exterminate all the trash who oppose me.
Are they our target this time?
Yeah, Al Capone and his friends, numbering up to roughly a hundred.
We will retrieve all the empty souls that have become Kishin soul eggs.
Conceal yourself in darkness... quiet your breath...
Be able to foresee his thoughts, his movements!
Defeat your target before he becomes aware of your existence.
I am the great Black Star!!
I have come to assassinate you!!
Do you even understand what an assassination is?!
Who the hell are you guys?
Let us retreat as soon as possible, Tsubaki!!
We have discovered the whereabouts of the witch.
Once we get our hands on the power of a witch, the family will be unstoppable!
That was a great stage today!
I cannot believe I have not retrieved a single Kishin egg yet...
I am going to start losing faith in everything thanks to him.
Are you playing on the words Kishin and Gishin?
Gishin is doubtful or unfaithful in Japanese.
A lame joke like that will never make it big!
But hey, no lame comedian could compete with a big guy like me!
Do you know the difference between them and me?
They suck so bad it is really sad!!
Just try to beat a joke like that!
That was not even a joke...
Did your eyes shrivel up in surprise?
The rate we are going, I cannot face Shinigami-sama...
Hm, is not there anything worthwhile here?
Luck just was not on our side when it came to finishing off Al Capone and friends.
But if we carry on failing our missions like we are doing now,
Was yesterday's mission a failure, too?
Yesterday was my greatest performance on stage!
You just were not able to cleanse and release the Kishin souls.
Well, that is exactly what happened.
And how did it go for the two of you?
I become depressed just thinking about it.
Attention, the Crescent Pair, Black Star-kun and Tsubaki-san,
I heard you were unable to kill Al Capone?
I will be sure to turn Tsubaki into a Death Scythe and make her Shinigama-sama's weapon.
In the meantime, I will let you have my signature.
You do not need a weapon anymore, right?
You two possess the skills, but I get the feeling you are having it a bit too hard.
I would personally like to keep you at your own pace, but we have a few problems to solve.
Al Capone's gang is after a witch and they have begun to make their move.
The name of the witch they are after is Angela.
Angela apparently has an outstanding bodyguard,
Then, if we defeat Al Capone's gang and the witch...
Ninety-nine souls plus one witch soul...
She would become a Death Scythe in an instant!
You know what they say, Make hay while the sun shines!
There is just a slight problem with this witch, Angela, by the way...
How could we possibly fight a witch if we cannot even accomplish the basic missions?
Anyway, we cannot just blindly barge in this time,
I do believe Tsubaki-chan would be much better off with any other partner, really.
He might be a fool, but he is got guts.
Tsubaki's probably aware that he is not just all talk.
Well then, shall we get going, too?
Well then, shall we get going, too?
The path to gather up ninety-nine Kishin souls is a long one.
We heard the witch lives in this castle.
With the power of a witch, my family will become the strongest!
What business does the king of the underworld have here?
Depending on your answer, you may die.
Depending on your answer, you may die.
How could we possibly fight a witch...
Hiding my presence is as easy as blinking for me.
I will catch Tsubaki by surprise and prove that to her.
Conceal yourself in darkness... quiet your breath...
We got almost no screen time at all.
If you are an assassin, then at least mask your presence properly!
And now I am dying... no presence... ok?
And now I am dying... no presence... ok?
And now I am dying... no presence... ok?
Off to our goal: To the witch's castle!
Did you come up with any sort of strategy?
I should have known that by now...
The Kishin souls in the form of Kishin eggs that are floating around here...
Did you come here after the witch's power, too?
I will allow you to be a stepping stone for me to get big!
My name is Mifune and I am the bodyguard of the witch, Angela.
I am Black Star, the man who will surpass God!
I am Black Star, the man who will surpass God!
Move away from Angela and leave this place.
Do not you feel small about yourself when you are facing someone as big as me?
Before, I used to get kind of freaked out by how big I was when I saw myself in the mirror.
You will not fall back no matter what?
If you want to kill me, go make a sword out of a Buddha!
I will be taking that one!
A normal chain would have been broken by now.
I cannot sleep well when I have to kill kids.
Are you calling me a kid?!
That is the complete opposite of big!
If you become one fourth of what you are now...
And this was your best chance!!
A blunt-strike is something done by people who are as great as me.
Do not you think you are being rude to that lady?
The fact that you have not been defeated until now is thanks to the quality of that weapon.
No matter how amazing the weapon, it is worthless if the hand that wields it is weak.
You are just a small fry, are you not?
You are just a small fry, are you not?
You have got it all wrong!
Black Star's just kind of silly, that is all.
He can actually do it if he tries!
I am just a bodyguard that protects Angela.
You are trying to keep all the attention on yourself by calling me a small fry!
Whatever the reason, he is become more serious...
It will not be a blunt strike this time.
Conceal yourself in darkness... quiet your breath...
Know your target, be able to foresee his thoughts, his movements.
Is this even the same kid?
It is as if I cannot feel his presence at all.
I am able to feel a faint presence.
But it is clearly a different person's presence.
Before your target becomes aware of your existence,
You tried to stand out more than me.
You are a million years too early to win against me!
Mifune's just protecting me from humans because I am not good at magic, yet!
There will not be another chance like this.
Meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie,
Meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie,
Meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie,
Meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie,
Meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie,
Meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie,
Meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie, meanie,
I am going to kill you, you damn brat!!
If you want my life, I will give it to you.
But, if you try to kill Angela...
What are we going to do?
A bodyguard who protects a half pint witch?
Besides, I cannot sleep well when I kill kids.
Yeah, it is not like it was me who did them in.
It is odd coming from me, but...
Such a thing would not suit someone as big as me.
Conceal yourself in darkness... quiet your breath...
The future's not looking so bright.
A perfect boy makes for a perfect ending.
Your soul, which turned into a Kishin's egg...
He is so much of a perfectionist that...
You are standing a bit more to the right!
What do you do for a living, Mr Customer?
Oh, so you wake up early every day?
No, that was a lie just now.
I am actually in the underwear making business.
Are your underwear the proper size?
This old man will take a look for you...
I will report you, you bastard.
It looks like it is finally our turn!
We will nail it for sure!
We, the clumsy girls, and the Shinigami-sama's son will go wild in the next episode!
Only the parts of me getting beaten up are being aired!
The final proposal for Art gallery Number 2, Maka?
